Jx.Store.Strategy.Progressive

Extends: Jx.Store.Strategy.Paginate

Store strategy for progressively obtaining results in a store.  You can continually call nextPage() to get the next page and the store will retain all current data.  You can set a maximum number of records the store should hold and whether it should dropRecords when that max is hit.

Summary
Jx.Store.Strategy.ProgressiveExtends: Jx.Store.Strategy.Paginate
Options
maxRecordsThe maximum number of records we want in the store at any one time.
dropRecordsWhether the strategy should drop records when the maxRecords limit is reached.
Functions
nextPageAllows a caller (i.e.
previousPageAllows a caller to move back to the previous page.

Options

maxRecords

The maximum number of records we want in the store at any one time.

dropRecords

Whether the strategy should drop records when the maxRecords limit is reached. if this is false then maxRecords is ignored and data is always added to the bottom of the store.

Functions

nextPage

nextPage: function (params)

Allows a caller (i.e. a paging toolbar) to load more data to the end of the store

Parameters

paramsa hash of parameters to pass to the request if needed.

previousPage

previousPage: function (params)

Allows a caller to move back to the previous page.

Parameters

paramsa hash of parameters to pass to the request if needed.
